description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Course Updated 22 January 2016

Why are 16,560 students wanting me to mentor them in 37 Udemy courses? 16,560 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015. Shouldn't you find out why?

Here's a FIVE STAR Review for this course:

"Great Course!

I've been procrastinating for over a year to get a course on Udemy and I have not done anything... After watching this course I feel like I can finally get a course done and on the Udemy platform by the end of November! Wish me luck and thanks again for the great course!" Donny M

You are about to discover how I was able to create 28 Udemy Courses in under 3 months!

I had no clue before I started creating Udemy courses, and I spent lots of hours learning and figuring out things through trial and error.

In this course you will learn to create detailed plans for your Udemy courses and why having deadlines is essential. You will also be shown how to avoid the bright shiny object syndrome which keeps most Udemy instructors from reaching their ultimate goals.

You will find your most important reason to create Udemy courses and I'll share a little about my reasons.

This course is not a technical course on how to create Udemy courses but more about the mindset, planning, strategies and techniques to get Udemy courses done fast.

This course is strictly not for procrastinators, and I am here to help so please feel free to ask me questions in the discussions thread of this course.

You are covered by a 30 day money back guarantee so enroll today. I look forward to mentoring you to get your Udemy courses completed quickly.
title: Udemy Instructor's Guide to Producing Courses - Unofficial
